UI_TEXT.你好，欢迎使用ZML节点~\n此节点会筛选掉你不想要的一些tag，你可以将R18:
Hello, welcome to ZML Nodes!
This node filters out unwanted tags. You can input tags to remove (e.g., R18 tags) into the bottom text box, and it will remove them from the text in the top box. For example, if the top input is '1girl,solo,nsfw,' and the filter input is 'nsfw,', the output will be '1girl,solo'. The removed tags are available at the '*Filtered*' output, which you can leave unconnected if not needed.
Have a great day!
UI_TEXT.你好，欢迎使用ZML节点~\n此节点会从第一个文本中删除第二个文本中指定的标签或:
Hello, welcome to ZML Nodes!
This node removes specified tags or substrings from the first text input. For example: if Text 1 is '#1girl,2girls,solo,' and the text to delete is '2girls,#,1,o,', the output will be 'girl,sl,'. Excess commas are cleaned up automatically.
Enjoy!
UI_TEXT.你好~欢迎使用ZML节点~本节点现在支持两种输入方式：文件或文本框。\n1. *:
Hello! Welcome to ZML Nodes. This node now supports two input methods: File or Textbox.
1. **File Mode**: Select a .txt file from the 'zml_w/txt' folder in the dropdown. The node will ignore the textbox and read lines from the selected file.
2. **Textbox Mode**: Set the dropdown to 'Disabled', and then you can input content directly into the textbox below.

The node supports three loading modes:
- **Index**: Loads the line corresponding to the specified 'Index' value.
- **Sequential**: Loads the next line in order each time it's run. The count is unique per node and resets on restart.
- **Random**: Selects a random line each time it's run.

Have a great day!
UI_TEXT.你好~欢迎使用ZML节点~\n此节点会自动读取'zml_w/txt'文件夹下的t:
Hello! Welcome to ZML Nodes.
This node automatically reads .txt files from the 'zml_w/txt' folder. Select a file from the dropdown, and the node will randomly pick a specified number of lines, assigning each a random weight between your set min and max values. You can also set the decimal precision for the weights. Trailing commas on each line are automatically removed to ensure correct formatting. The node comes with a text file of 1000 artists, and you can add your own.
If not reading from a file, it will load tags from the textbox and apply random weights to them!
Have fun!
